title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to see Eligible Re-Selection Date in the Outrights section of Pro Player Profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is signed in as a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN in the Outrights section of the Waivers & Transactions tab on Pro Player Profiles
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new 'Eligible Re-Selection Date'
AND this date will populate with the date the player is eligible to be re-selected
AND standard logic will be used to calculate this date [10 days for position players, 15 days for pitchers]

title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to see Recently Outrighted Players in the Major League Roster widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN in the Major League Roster widget
custom_expected:
THEN the same recently outrighted players that appear on the PIS Report will not appear in the Major League Roster widget [player who's Outright Date <= 15 Days earlier than today's date, the player will appear in the MJ Roster wdiget]
AND the Eligible Re-Selection Date for these players will be populated in the Eligible Recall Date column 
AND standard re-selection date logic will apply [10 days for position players, 15 days for pitchers]

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Player Memo History widget to track failures
custom_preconds:
Wire:  https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=player_memos&g=1

GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN on the Player Memo History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN a 'Failures' column should exist in the Player Memo History widget [as seen in wireframe]
AND if there are failed deliveries when a memo is sent the 'Failures' column should display the number of failed deliveries
AND there will be a download icon in the column if there are failed deliveries
AND clicking the icon will generate a spreadsheet that encloses information to any failed deliveries [i.e. player name, contact info, communication type, error if possible]

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Special Rosters to be made available for Lineup Cards
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN system date is after a specified date (typically the last day of the championship season)
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS will make special rosters [Wild Card, Division Series, League Championship Series, World Series] available for LineupCards to pull
AND the latest ***approved*** version of the rosters will be available

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to add an attachment to a player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1

GIVEN a user is signed in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN in the Player Memo widget of the Communication tab
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an attach file section o na new player memo as shown in the wire
AND users will be able to drag and drop or browse for a file to attach
AND when a file is attached
THEN Filename, Last Modified, and Size will be displayed
AND there will be a trashcan icon displayed that will enable the user to remove the file
THEN when the blast is sent, the email will contain the attached files as attachments
AND there will be a file size limit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to create a new player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1]

GIVEN a user is signed in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN on the Player Memo History widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a New Memo button
AND clicking the button will load the new player memo screen
AND the screen will match the provided wire [the attachment section and wysiwyg editor will both work as expected]
AND there will be a Cancel button on the page
AND clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action
THEN if the user confirms, they will be returned to the Player Memo tab
BUT if the user **does not** confirm, the warning will be dismissed

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see Re-Selection Date for Outrighted Players on the PIS Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has been outrighted within the past 15 days
custom_steps: WHEN users run the Player Information Summary Report
custom_expected:
THEN recently outrighted players will have their Eligible Re-Selection Date appear on the PIS Report
AND the date will display in the Eligible Recall column
AND dates will follow standard Re-Selection Logic [10 Days for Position Players, 15 Days for Pitchers]

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to specify the recipient(s) on a new player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1

GIVEN a user is signed in as BOC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN opening a New Memo in the Player Memo History widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a 'Players' dropdown at the top of a new player memo with the values [All Players, 26-Man, 40-Man, Non-40-Man, Minor Leagues, Specific Player]
AND if a value other than 'Specific Player' is selected, an Org dropdown will appear, as depicted in the wire
AND the dropdown will be required, if visible
THEN the memo will be sent to players at the roster level and the org specified
BUT if 'Specific Player' is selected, a Player field will appear(not depicted)
AND this Player field will function the same, and have the same population, as the pro player quick search
AND the field will be required, if visible
THEN the memo will be sent to the player specified

title: As a BOC User, I want to open a sent player memo
custom_preconds:
Data Discovery:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2575892525/Data+Discovery+-+Memo+History|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2575892525/Data+Discovery+-+Memo+History]

GIVEN a use is signed in as BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN a Player Memo is sent
custom_expected:
THEN sent memos will be displayed in the History widget on the Player Memos tab
AND there will be a paperclip icon that allows the user to open any attached files
AND the subject line will be a hyperlink
AND clicking the hyperlink will open the sent memo, which will match the wire
AND the memo will not be editable
AND there will be two additional fields [Sent(timestamp), Sent By(username)]
AND there will be a Close button, which when clicked, will return the user to the Player memo tab

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1]

GIVEN a user is signed in as BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a new Player Memo or a saved template
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Send Button
AND clicking Send will prompt the user to confirm their action
AND if they click Cancel, the Warning will be dismissed
BUT if they click Send, the email will be sent to all specified recipients and include all attached files
THEN EBIS will send the memo to all forms of communication listed on the specified recipients' profiles in the 'MLB Contact Info' section of their profile [Email, Text, Whatsapp]
THEN after the memo is sent, the user will be returned to the player memo tab
AND a blue **SENT** notification will be displayed
AND sender will be EBIS XYZ

title: As a League Economics user I want to be able to choose to roll up True-Up charges on the Payrolls - Player Details report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN CBT is selected on the Payrolls - Player Detail report 
AND the report has the Roll Up True-Up Charges parameter 
AND the value defaults to no
custom_steps: WHEN the report is ran with Roll Up True-Up Charges set to 'No'
custom_expected:
THEN there is no change to the report
BUT WHEN the report is ran with Roll Up True-Up Charges set to 'Yes'
THEN any player who has a True-Up charge and a regular line item for the same team will have the values combined and '-True-Up' will not display on their record
AND any player who has a True-Up charge but no other line item for the same team will simply have the '-True-Up' removed from their name and the line will appear as if its a normal salary

title: As a MNC Admin, I do not want Draft and Follow contracts to count against pool money on the R4 Signing Bonus Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is signed in as MNC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a Draft and Follow player signs a MNC
custom_expected:
THEN their contract information will populate on the Rule 4 Signing Bonus Utility, as expected
AND the Amount Towards Threshold column will display 0 for these contracts
AND the signing bonus will not factor into any pool calculations

title: As a MNC Admin, I want a Draft and Follow Filter on the Pending Approvals clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is signed in as an MNC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN on the BOC Pending Approvals Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new 'Draft and Follows' option in the Minor Contract Type dropdown
AND selecting this option will filter the clipboard to show contracts created for Draft and Follow players
AND if the 'All' checkbox is selected, the clipboard population will include the Draft and Follow contracts

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Clubs to be able to submit Draft and Follow contracts after the Signing Deadline
custom_preconds:
Rule 5.16: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit

GIVEN a user is signed in as an MNC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN drafted players are signed after the Rule 4 Signing Deadline
custom_expected:
THEN rule 5.16 [prevents drafted players from being signed after Rule 4 Signing Deadline] should not apply to players flagged as Draft and Follow players
AND if a player is flagged as a Draft and Follow player
THEN the selecting Club will be able to submit a contract beyond the R4 Signing Deadline
BUT the selecting Club will **not** be able to submit a contract for a Draft and Follow player once the Closed Period has begun

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Clubs to be prevented from submitting a MNC for a Draft and Follow player that is greater than $225k
custom_preconds:
Rule 5.62: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3784601/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit|smart-link] 

GIVEN a user is signed in as an MNC Admin
custom_steps: WHEN a club is submitting an MNC for a Draft and Follow Player
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new system constant created for Draft and Follow Max Bonus [should be set to $225,000]
AND there will be a new On Submit rule check for First Year Domestic MNCs to see if the player is a Draft and Follow player
THEN if Draft and Follow is true, the system will validate that the included signing bonus does not exceed the Draft and Follow Max Bonus constant
THEN if the check fails, an error will be returned [hard error for Clubs, overridable by BOC] 
     **Body:** *Signing bonuses provided to Draft-and-Follow Players may not exceed $225,000. Please contact the BOC with any questions* 
     **Buttons:** *Ignored & Continue(BOC Only), Back*

custom_preconds:
Related to https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-20367

**Business Value:** When a player is registered or updated in IPL, the username that is being displayed in EBIS is "IplToEbisReceiver"
